title: Boston National Historical Park: Safety
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Safety            Safety       Boston National Historical Park is located in an urban setting.   Be careful crossing busy streets. Watch your step.  Boston has many uneven surfaces. Guard your valuables and lock your car. In case of an emergency, call 911.    To help protect park resources and ensure a safe and enjoyable visit for everyone, please follow park rules and posted regulation.   Pets are not allowed in public buildings, unless a designated service animal. Please dispose of your garbage or recyclables in designated bins, or take it with you when you leave. To ensure safety, all visitors wishing to visit USS Constitution will be subject to a security screening, visitors 18 and older and must present a valid federal or state issued photo ID at the ship's security entrance.
